attributes.action: Disallow prosecutions for incomplete NIPs where the original allegation is unproven.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are thousands of motorists who are prosecuted for failure to properly complete and return an NIP "Notice of Intended Prosecution" where they have neither been cautioned (as must occur  in any other allegation) nor proven to be guilty of an original offence upon which the subsequent proceedings are based. Against a background of the punishment for minor motoring offences becoming wholly disproportionate, we would urge that neither penalty points nor fines should be levied for matters relating to NIP documents unless an offence has first been proven beyond reasonable doubt.
